[
    {"page": "Home", 
     "functions":
        [
            {"function": "Create QR Code", 
             "description": "Generate a new QR code from scratch with the ability to add text, URL, email, phone number, and more."},
            {"function": "Design Studio", 
             "description": "Customize your QR code design by choosing from various shapes, colors, and patterns."}
        ]
    },
    {"page": "Generate QR Code", 
     "functions":
        [
            {"function": "Add Text", 
             "description": "Enter the text you want to encode in the QR code."},
            {"function": "Add URL", 
             "description": "Link your QR code to any website or webpage"},
            {"function": "Add Email", 
             "description": "Attach an email address or a mailto link to the QR code."}
        ]
    },
    {"page": "QR Code Editor", 
     "functions":
        [
            {"function": "Change Foreground Color", 
             "description": "Select from various colors to change the foreground color of your QR code."},
            {"function": "Add Pattern", 
             "description": "Customize with various designs, patterns or shapes"},
            {"function": "Rotate QR Code", 
             "description": "Rotate the QR code in any direction."}
        ]
    },
    {"page": "Save and Download", 
     "functions":
        [
            {"function": "Download as PNG", 
             "description": "Download your QR code as a PNG image."},
            {"function": "Download as SVG", 
             "description": "Download your QR code as an SVG vector."}  
        ]
    },
    {"page": "Analytics & Statistics", 
     "functions":
        [
            {"function": "Scan History", 
             "description": "View and track scans of your QR code, including timestamp, device type, and location."},
            {"function": "URL Click Statistics", 
             "description": "Get insights into the number of clicks on links encoded in your QR code."},  
            {"function": "Share QR Code", 
            "description": " Share QR code with friends"        
        ]
    }
]
